about.description:
Quart-Trio is an extension for Quart to support the Trio event loop.
This is an alternative to using the asyncio event loop present in the Python
standard library and supported by default in Quart.
about.summary: Quart-Trio is an extension for Quart to support the Trio event loop

about.description:
Quart-Trio is an extension for Quart to support the Trio event loop.
This is an alternative to using the asyncio event loop present in the Python
standard library and supported by default in Quart.
about.summary: Quart-Trio is an extension for Quart to support the Trio event loop

name: quart-trio
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "Quart-Trio" %}
{% set version = "0.7.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 933e3c18e232ece30ccbac7579fdc5f62f2f9c79c3273d6c341f5a1686791eb1

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3.7.0
    - pip
  run:
    - python >=3.7.0
    - quart >=0.11.1
    - trio >=0.10.0
    - hypercorn >=0.6.0

test:
  imports:
    - quart_trio

about:
  home: https://gitlab.com/pgjones/quart-trio
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Quart-Trio is an extension for Quart to support the Trio event loop
  description: |
    Quart-Trio is an extension for Quart to support the Trio event loop.
    This is an alternative to using the asyncio event loop present in the Python
    standard library and supported by default in Quart.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - dhirschfeld
    - scopatz
